sql.trim: a.id AS "id", a.main_id AS "main.id", IFNULL(main.task_name,'') AS "main.taskName", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN tfam_asset_checkplan_main main ON main.id = a.main_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tfam_asset_checkplan_main_dept a
WHERE a.main_id = #{mainId} and a.dept_id = #{deptId} and a.del_flag = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tfam_asset_checkplan_main_dept a
1=1 AND a.id > 0 AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
